aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Hamza Hanif
aboutData.subtitle: All my skills in this field are showcased here
aboutData.text: Detail-oriented Lead QA Engineer with over 9 years of extensive experience in ensuring the quality and functionality of diverse digital products and platforms Proficient in a wide range of tools including JIRA, TestRail, Postman, and various automation frameworks.

services.title: Mosaik
services.text: Led QA for multiple product lines, specializing in property management and real estate applications.

services.title: W1tty
services.text: Managing and testing functionalities related to beneficiaries management, money transfers, and bill payments.

services.title: AION Digital
services.text: Handled card issuance, processing, and digital banking, including IBAN-based transactions.

services.title: Retailo technologies
services.text: Led a team to perform API, database, GUI, and end-to-end testing for mobile apps and web portals.

services.title: Jeeny
services.text: Tested APIs, databases, GUIs, core functions, and modules for logistics and Google Maps integration.

services.title: Slashnext
services.text: Specialized in comprehensive back-end QA for websites, portals, browser extensions, and mobile apps.

services.title: GenITeam
services.text: Tested games on Android, iOS, and Kindle, focusing on UI/UX and gameplay mechanics.

services.title: Careem(Uber)
services.text: Managed QA for Careem's web products across multiple portals, ensuring high quality standards.

services.title: VentureDive
services.text: Worked on projects for Careem, a leading ride-hailing service in the MENA region

skillData.title: All the skills that I have in that field of work are mentioned.
skillData.text: I am highly skilled in ensuring software quality and reliability through a diverse range of tools and methodologies. With expertise in API testing using Postman and UI automation with Cypress, I deliver robust and maintainable test solutions. My proficiency extends to mobile application testing with Appium, and performance testing using JMeter, enabling seamless functionality and optimal performance of applications.

informations.title: Khuram Asghar
informations.text: I have had the pleasure of working closely with Hamza as a Software Quality Assurance Engineer, and I can confidently say that he is an invaluable asset to any team.

informations.title: Roman Voronyi
informations.text: Hamza is a cooperative guy with high attention to details. He always carefully investigates requirements and tries to cover all possible edgecases during testing.

informations.title: Farid Arshad
informations.text: I have worked with many professionals throughout my career, but Hamza was a unique one to work. His work always speaks about his strengths and dedication.

informations.title: Zehra Naqvi
informations.text: I have worked with many professionals throughout my career, but Hamza was a unique one to work. His work always speaks about his strengths and dedication.
